definitions: sports; athletics
examplesRomanized: hami khelkudma sahabhagi bhayau.
exampleEnglish: We participated in sports.

definitions: game; play
examples: विद्यालयमा हरेक विद्यार्थी खेलकुदमा उत्साहपूर्वक सहभागी हुन्छन्।
examplesRomanized: harek khelma utsahpurvak sahabhagi hunchhan.
exampleEnglish: Everyone participates enthusiastically in games.

definitions: football; soccer
examplesRomanized: aaj phutbalko khel chha.
exampleEnglish: There's a football match today.

definitions: cricket
examplesRomanized: hami kriket khelna maidan gayaun.
exampleEnglish: We went to the ground to play cricket.

definitions: volleyball
examplesRomanized: bhalibalko pratiyogita suru bhayo.
exampleEnglish: The volleyball tournament started.

definitions: basketball
examplesRomanized: unile basketbal ramro khelchhan.
exampleEnglish: He plays basketball well.

definitions: athletics (track and field)
examplesRomanized: athleticsma swarna padak jiti yo.
exampleEnglish: A gold medal was won in athletics.

definitions: wrestling
examplesRomanized: kustiko abhyas bihan hunchha.
exampleEnglish: Wrestling practice is in the morning.

definitions: taekwondo
examplesRomanized: unle taekwondoma talim liye.
exampleEnglish: He took training in taekwondo.

definitions: running; track (event)
examplesRomanized: dhawan pratiyogita bholi chha.
exampleEnglish: The running event is tomorrow.

definitions: swimming
examplesRomanized: tairakiko abhyas niyamit garnuhos.
exampleEnglish: Practice swimming regularly.

definitions: gymnastics
examplesRomanized: gymnasticsma lachakta aawashyak hunchha.
exampleEnglish: Flexibility is necessary in gymnastics.

definitions: A competitive running race, typically referring to sprinting or marathons.
examples: विद्यालयले हात्ती दौडको प्रतियोगिता आयोजना गर्यो।
examplesRomanized: vidyalay le hatti daud ko pratiyogita aayojana garyo.
exampleEnglish: The school organized a running race competition.

definitions: A swimming competition where participants race in various swimming styles.
examplesRomanized: sangitik karyakramma tairaki pratiyogita bhayo.
exampleEnglish: A swimming competition was held at the event.

definitions: A sport where two or four players hit a lightweight ball back and forth on a table divided by a net.
examplesRomanized: hamile schoolma table tennis khelyau.
exampleEnglish: We played table tennis at school.

definitions: An informal term sometimes used for dodgeball or ball games involving quick throws and dodges.
examples: हाम्रो समूहले हात्ती बल खेल्दै रमाइलो गर्‍यो।
examplesRomanized: hamro samuh le hatti bal kheldai ramailo garyo.
exampleEnglish: Our group had fun playing dodgeball.

definitions: Swimming training sessions to improve technique, stamina, and speed.
examples: बच्चाहरूलाई तैराकी तालिम दिनु आवश्यक छ।
examplesRomanized: bachaharu lai tairaki talim dinu aawashyak chha.
exampleEnglish: It is necessary to provide swimming training to children.

definitions: A contact team sport played with an oval ball, where teams attempt to score by grounding the ball in the opponent’s goal area.
examplesRomanized: Nepal ma rugby ko lokpriyata baddai chha.
exampleEnglish: Rugby is becoming increasingly popular in Nepal.

definitions: A sport involving the use of firearms or bows to hit a target accurately.
examples: उनले शूटिङ प्रतियोगितामा स्वर्ण पदक जिते।
examplesRomanized: unle shooting pratiyogita ma swarn padak jite.
exampleEnglish: He won a gold medal in the shooting competition.

definitions: A martial art focusing on punches, kicks, and defensive techniques.
examples: बालबालिकालाई क्याराटे सिकाउने कक्षा सञ्चालन हुन्छ।
examplesRomanized: balbalika lai karate sikaune kaksha sanchalan hunchha.
exampleEnglish: Classes are conducted to teach children karate.

definitions: Traditional or indigenous games played in villages or cultural festivals.
examplesRomanized: gaun ma paramparagat khel haru ajhai khelinchhan.
exampleEnglish: Traditional games are still played in the village.

definitions: A competition or contest, often in sports or games.
examplesRomanized: vidyalay ma football pratiyogita aayojana bhayo.
exampleEnglish: A football competition was organized at school.

definitions: Inter-school sports competitions where students from different schools compete.
examples: अन्तरविद्यालयी खेलमा हाम्रो टोलीले ट्रफी जित्यो।
examplesRomanized: antarvidyalayi khel ma hamro toli le trophy jityo.
exampleEnglish: Our team won the trophy in the inter-school sports competition.

definitions: Physical training or conditioning exercises to improve strength, stamina, and fitness.
examplesRomanized: kheladi harule niyamit bhautik prashikshan garchhan.
exampleEnglish: Athletes undergo regular physical training.

definitions: Games or sports that reflect cultural traditions or are played during festivals.
examples: गणतन्त्र दिवसमा साँस्कृतिक खेल प्रदर्शन गरिन्छ।
examplesRomanized: ganatantra diwas ma sanskrutik khel pradarshan garinchha.
exampleEnglish: Cultural games are performed on Republic Day.

definitions: Small-scale games or sports, often indoor or casual competitions.
examples: विद्यालयको खेलकुद दिवसमा मिनी खेल आयोजना गरियो।
examplesRomanized: vidyalay ko khelkud diwas ma mini khel aayojana garyo.
exampleEnglish: Mini-games were organized on the school sports day.

definitions: Games or sports played by a group of players forming teams against each other.
examples: फुटबल र भलिबल टीम खेलका उदाहरण हुन्।
examplesRomanized: football ra volleyball team khel ka udaharan hun.
exampleEnglish: Football and volleyball are examples of team sports.

definitions: Individual sports or games where a single player competes alone.
examples: टेबल टेनिस र शतरंज एकल खेल हुन्।
examplesRomanized: table tennis ra shatranj ekal khel hun.
exampleEnglish: Table tennis and chess are examples of individual sports.

definitions: A sports festival where various games and competitions are held.
examples: विद्यालयले वार्षिक खेलकुद उत्सव आयोजना गर्‍यो।
examplesRomanized: vidyalay le warshik khelkud utsav aayojana garyo.
exampleEnglish: The school organized the annual sports festival.

definitions: A race or running event, usually part of track and field sports.
examples: विद्यालयको वार्षिक खेलकुदमा १०० मिटर दौड भयो।
examplesRomanized: vidyalay ko warshik khelkud ma 100 meter daud bhayo.
exampleEnglish: A 100-meter race was held at the school's annual sports event.

definitions: Table tennis; a fast-paced indoor racket sport.
examples: स्कुलमा पिङ पङ प्रतियोगिता आयोजना गरियो।
examplesRomanized: school ma ping pang pratiyogita aayojana garyo.
exampleEnglish: A table tennis competition was organized at the school.

definitions: Chess; a strategic board game played between two players.
examples: उनले शतरंजमा राष्ट्रिय स्तरको प्रतियोगिता जिते।
examplesRomanized: unle shatranj ma rashtriya star ko pratiyogita jite.
exampleEnglish: He won a national-level chess competition.

definitions: The wooden bat used by players to hit the ball in cricket.
examples: खेलाडीले बल हान्न क्रिकेट ब्याट समाए।
examplesRomanized: kheladi le bal haann cricket bat samaye.
exampleEnglish: The player held the cricket bat to hit the ball.

definitions: The frame or structure in football or hockey where players aim to score goals.
examplesRomanized: kheladi le bal goal post ma prahar garyo.
exampleEnglish: The player struck the ball toward the goal post.

definitions: A competition where participants race bicycles over a set distance.
examples: साइकल रेसमा धेरै प्रतिस्पर्धी सहभागी भए।
examplesRomanized: cycle race ma dherai pratispardhi sahabhagi bhaye.
exampleEnglish: Many competitors participated in the cycling race.

definitions: A cue sport played on a rectangular table with 21 colored balls and a cue stick.
examplesRomanized: shahar ma snooker pratiyogita aayojana bhayo.
exampleEnglish: A snooker competition was organized in the city.

definitions: A team sport played on a field or indoor surface, where players use sticks to hit a ball into the opponent’s goal.
examples: नेपालको राष्ट्रिय हाकी टोली उत्कृष्ट प्रदर्शन गर्‍यो।
examplesRomanized: Nepal ko rashtriya hockey toli utkrista pradarshan garyo.
exampleEnglish: Nepal’s national hockey team performed excellently.

definitions: A water sport where a person rides waves on a surfboard.
examples: समुद्रमा सर्फिङ गर्दा धेरै मजा आउँछ।
examplesRomanized: samudra ma surfing garda dherai maja aunchha.
exampleEnglish: Surfing in the sea is very enjoyable.

definitions: A sport in which players throw metal balls as close as possible to a smaller target ball.
examplesRomanized: bagaicha ma petank khelindai thiyo.
exampleEnglish: Petanque was being played in the garden.

definitions: A water sport in which a person jumps or falls into water from a platform or springboard, often performing acrobatics.
examplesRomanized: antararastriya pratiyogita ma diving khelaio.
exampleEnglish: Diving was included in the international competition.

definitions: A long-distance running race, typically 42.195 kilometers.
examples: सहरमा वार्षिक माराथन प्रतियोगिता आयोजना भयो।
examplesRomanized: shahar ma warshik marathon pratiyogita aayojana bhayo.
exampleEnglish: The annual marathon competition was held in the city.
